attributes.action: Give uber it's license to operate in London
attributes.background: TFL have decided to not renew ubers license to operate in London, putting 40,000 people out of work and taking away consumer choice. Millions of people use the uber app every year and they do so because it's reliable and affordable. I myself and everyone I know who uses uber have never felt unsafe.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
